name: Swift Strike
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect: HIT - [Weapon damage], +10 damage if you are using a Light Weapon.

name: Cheap Shot
requirements:
Light Melee Weapon
Advantage on the target
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect: HIT - The target is {effect:stunned} until the end of its next turn.

name: Cloak and Dagger
target: One creature in your weapon range

name: Mutilate
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect:
HIT - [Weapon]+15 damage.
SPECIAL - Inflicts {effect:weakened}, and the target is also {effect:stunned} until the end of its next turn.

name: Hidden Stride
effect: You gain Shroud, and you can {power:disengage} then {power:move} (or vice-versa).

name: Shadow Stab
target:
One creature in your weapon range
(after your movement)
effect:
SPECIAL - Before the attack, you can move 2 squares without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
HIT - [Weapon]+5 damage.
DAMAGE - Inflicts {effect:crippled}.

name: Rending Whirl
target: All creatures in your melee range

name: Shadow Shot
effect:
HIT - [Weapon] damage, you gain {effect:shroud} and you can immediately {power:swap}.
DAMAGE - You can move 4 squares to the closest free square adjacent to the target, without provoking Opportunity Attacks. You MUST be able to reach the target to initiate the movement.

name: Sneak Attack
requirements:
Light Weapon
Advantage on the target
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect:
HIT - [Weapon]+15 damage. 
You inflict 1 additional damage for each Wound the target is currently missing (with a maximum of 15).

name: Sniper Shot
effect:
SPECIAL - As long as you can see the target, you can attack it - you ignore any Disadvantage when making this attack.
HIT - [Weapon]+10 damage. If you are under {effect:shroud}, you deal 15 additional damage.

name: Trick Shot
effect: HIT - [Weapon] damage, and you can bounce Trick Shot to a different creature that you can see within 2 squares of the original target. Repeat a Trick Shot attack against that secondary target.

name: Tumble
requirements:
Light Armor or No Armor
Trigger: You are hit by an Attack or a Spell
effect:
Make an Agility roll. If your roll is higher than the attack roll that hit you, you dodge the attack - the attack misses you.
If you successfully dodged, you can immediately move 1+AGI squares (without provoking Opportunity Attacks).
If you didn't dodge the attack, you can move move 1+AGI squares (without provoking Opportunity Attacks) but only after the triggering attack is resolved.
